subject: Women walking behind men
msgSnippet: Although I will admit the idea of a woman walking behind a man more then likely had more to do with his status and/or gender than with protecting the woman.

Although I will admit the idea of a woman walking behind a man more 
then likely had more to do with his status and/or gender than with 
protecting the woman.  However, in the West there is still a tendancy 
(although not always, and it seems to be decling slowly) for men, 
even when walking side by side with a woman, to walk on the side that 
the road is on.  There may be others, but the explaination that I 
have heard for this social phenomenea stems from the time in which 
horses were used, and could easily go off the street and cause 
serious injury or death.  So there is a possiblity of some form of 
protection with women walking a step behind a man (please don't flame 
me feminists :D).
